slide.title: Unbuffered Queries
slide.blurb: Like MySQL, SQLite supports unbuffered queries that can be used to more efficiently retrieve data.

list.bullet: |00AA00|15-30% performance increase depending on the number of rows fetched.|
|00AA00|Data is available right away, don't need to wait for all data to be pre-fetched.|
|FF0000|Can only move forward one row at a time.|
|FF0000|Each row can only be accessed once.|
